title: Casual elegance and sophisticated urbanism
posting_body: ['Text 5559A to my cell for more info!', 'Are you ready to make your move into a new home?', ' I’d like to help!', ' As a native to Dallas, with 10 years of experience in the rental housing market, I know how to help you in the most efficient and productive way.', ' I have access to thousands of apartments, condos and houses, including the private market.', 'I will not send you random properties, that may or may not be a good fit and that may or may not have anything available.', ' I will send you direct links to the actual property, with up-to-date availability, pricing and floor plans.', ' Once you decide on the properties that are a good fit for you, I will map out a plan and schedule tours, on your behalf, for each individual property.', 'Let me do the work and all you have to do is point and click and show up for the appointment.', 'How do I get paid for my services, you may ask?', ' I get paid by the management company that you choose to lease from.', ' My services are free to you!', ' All that is needed is that you write my name down, on the application, as the referring agent that help you.', 'Disclaimer:  I do not service short term housing.', ' You will have to call the property directly to ask for corporate housing or short-term rental options.', 'Must have excellent rental history, no criminal background record and valid bank records or an offer letter to validate income of three times the rent.', ' Credit scores don’t need to be perfect, as long as you don’t owe any properties money.', 'I look forward to helping you make your home search an easy success!', 'WELCOME TO LAKEWOOD FLATS APARTMENTS', 'Located in the Lakewood area of Dallas at White Rock Lake, Lakewood Flats Apartments is a luxury apartment community with a most desirable balance, casual elegance, sophisticated urbanism and a world of style dedicated solely to you.', "It's the best of both worlds: being just minutes from downtown and Lower Greenville area with immediate access to the Santa Fe Trail.", 'Our luxury 1 and 2 bedroom apartment flats and townhomes for rent offer premium finishes that include stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, kitchen islands, stained concrete or wood-style flooring, and so much more.', 'Community amenities such as our resort-style swimming pool, 24-hour fitness center with FREE boot camp classes, 2 dog parks, and entertainment lounge make coming to Lakewood Flats the best place to call home!']
